Package org.cvs.application.api

Class PortfolioController

java.lang.Object
org.cvs.application.api.PortfolioController
@Controller
@RequestMapping(path="/portfolios")
public class PortfolioController
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • PortfolioController

      public PortfolioController()

  • Method Details

    • addNewPortfolio

      @PostMapping(path="") @ResponseBody public Portfolio addNewPortfolio​(@RequestBody Portfolio portfolio)
      Adds a new portfolio to an optional application user via POST through URL: /portfolios.

      Example payload: { "name": "Test portfolio 5", "applicationUser": [{"id": 141}] }

      Parameters:
      portfolio - the portfolio (can be a JSON payload) to be added to the system.
      Returns:
      the newly added portfolio

    • getPortfolio

      @GetMapping(path="/active/{portfolioId}") @ResponseBody public Portfolio getPortfolio​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long portfolioId)
      Fetches an active portfolio via GET through URL: /portfolios/active/{portfolioId}.

      Example URL: /portfolios/active/1

      Parameters:
      portfolioId - the portfolio ID as a request parameter to be used in the query
      Returns:
      an active portfolio if found

    • getByPortfolioName

      @GetMapping(path="/name") @ResponseBody public Portfolio getByPortfolioName​(@RequestParam java.lang.String name)
      Fetches an active portfolio via GET through URL: /portfolios/name.

      Example URL: /portfolios/name?name=test5

      Parameters:
      name - the portfolio name as a request parameter to be used in the query
      Returns:
      an active portfolio if found

    • deletePortfolio

      @DeleteMapping(path="{portfolioId}") @ResponseBody public java.lang.String deletePortfolio​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long portfolioId)
      Deletes a portfolio via DELETE method through base URL: /portfolios/{portfolioId}.

      Example URL: /portfolios/1

      Parameters:
      portfolioId - the portfolio (can be a JSON payload) to be deleted from the system.
      Returns:
      a string that says 'Deleted'

    • retirePortfolio

      @PostMapping(path="/retire/{portfolioId}") @ResponseBody public java.lang.String retirePortfolio​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long portfolioId)
      Retires a portfolio via POST through URL: /portfolios/retire/{portfolioId}.

      Example URL: /portfolios/retire/1

      Parameters:
      portfolioId - the ID of the portfolio to be retired from the system.
      Returns:
      a string that says 'Retired'

    • getAllPortfolios

      @GetMapping(path="") @ResponseBody public java.lang.Iterable<Portfolio> getAllPortfolios()
      Fetches all active portfolios via GET through URL: /portfolios.

    • getPortfolios

      @GetMapping(path="/user/{userId}") @ResponseBody public java.lang.Iterable<Portfolio> getPortfolios​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long userId)
      Fetches active portfolios for a specific candidate via GET through URL: /portfolios/users/{userId}.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to filter portfolios for
      Returns:
      a list of all active portfolio entries for a particular user
